@description.name: @description
@description
@description.body:
Whether the size of the widget depends on the selected child. When
disabled (default) the size is configured to the largest child.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: property apply

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the widget for the selection.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns if the selection could be empty or not.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true If selection could be empty, false otherwise.
@return.desc: true If selection could be empty, false otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the given item is selectable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The item to be checked

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the given item is selectable
@return.desc: Whether the given item is selectable

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for changeSelection. Shows the new selected widget and hide the old one.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Data} Data event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Go to the previous child in the children list.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Go to the next child in the children list.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.desc:
Should return an error when the type of
model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a consistent and up-to-date model value. Note: returned value can also be a promise of type Promise<*|null>.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var|null} The model value plain or as promise.
@return.desc: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Returns an array of currently selected items.

Note: The result is only a set of selected items, so the order can
differ from the sequence in which the items were added.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Replaces current selection with the given items.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: items {qx.ui.core.Widget[]} Items to select.

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects whether the given item is currently selected.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.core.Widget} Any valid selectable item

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the item is not a child element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the selection is empty.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns all elements which are selectable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
all {Boolean} true for all selectables, false for the
selectables the user can interactively select
@param.description:
true for all selectables, false for the
selectables the user can interactively select

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for changeSelected event on single selection manager.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Data} Data event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Return the selection manager if it is already exists, otherwise creates
the manager.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the children list

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{LayoutItem[]} The children array (Arrays are
reference types, please do not modify them in-place)
@return.desc:
The children array (Arrays are
reference types, please do not modify them in-place)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the widget contains children.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Returns true when the widget has children.
@return.desc: Returns true when the widget has children.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given widget if it is a child widget. Otherwise it returns -1. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {Widget} the widget to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.
@return.desc: The index position or -1 when the given widget is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Adds a new child widget.

The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout manager
used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class
documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {LayoutItem} the widget to add.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Add a child widget at the specified index

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {LayoutItem} Widget to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index, at which the widget will be inserted
@param.description: Index, at which the widget will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Add a widget before another already inserted widget

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {LayoutItem} Widget to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: before {LayoutItem} Widget before the new widget will be inserted.
@param.description: Widget before the new widget will be inserted.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Add a widget after another already inserted widget

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {LayoutItem} Widget to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: after {LayoutItem} Widget, after which the new widget will be inserted
@param.description: Widget, after which the new widget will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove the given child widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {LayoutItem} the widget to remove

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Remove the widget at the specified index.

This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
(e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index of the widget to remove.
@param.description: Index of the widget to remove.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove all children.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} An array of the removed children.
@return.desc: An array of the removed children.
